screens.name: Copy_1_of_Transaction_Type_Selection_Screen
screens.label: Transaction Type Selection Screen for Portal

fields.name: Existing_Revision_Screen_Language
fields.fieldText: There is an in-progress Revision for this Permit. Please complete it before creating another one.

fields.name: Revision_Attestation_Screen_Language
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you wish to complete the Revision?

fields.name: Revision_Confirmation_Screen_Language
fields.fieldText: A revision record has been created for permit {!Get_Permit.Name}. Please click here to continue the review process.
